attributes.action: Support Helen Newlove, outlaw gangs on street corners and abusing passers by
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think Police should be given more powers to charge gangs of drunken, drug crazed, abusive and potentailly violent yobs on street corners, parks, tunnels, pedestrian walk ways etc, to make our streets safe again to walk down any time day or night without being too scared to go out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
